title: Facebook And EBay Promise Crackdown On Fake Reviews
text: Following pressure from the UK's Competition and Markets Authority (CMA), Facebook and eBay have agreed to work harder to eliminate fake reviews from their sites.

title: Facebook and eBay take action on fake reviews
text: Facebook and eBay have taken action to combat the trade in fake and misleading online reviews after pressure from the UK competition watchdog.

title: Facebook and eBay ban users trading fake reviews after warning from the UK
text: Facebook and eBay have had signed agreements with Britain's competition watchdog promising to tackle misleading reviews.

title: Facebook Stock Stands to Benefit as the World Embraces Its Apps
